paper_abstract: A new family of test statistics for testing linear hypotheses in baseline-category logit models is introduced and its asymptotic distribution is obtained. The new family is a natural extension of the classical likelihood ratio test. A simulation study is carried out to find new test statistics that offer an attractive alternative to the classical likelihood ratio test in terms of both exact size and exact power. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: An extension of likelihood-ratio-test for testing linear hypotheses in the baseline-category logit model
